entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 16. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
